Summary: Took picture off the falls-did not see object.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 6:35 am and nobody down by the falls on this monday morning-from my hotel room window at the fallsview casino on the 18 th floor i decided to take a shot of the falls --not one but two when i got home and uploaded the shots to my computer -i found this object which is bigger than as a seagul- about as big as a truck an gone by my next picture... I made some enhancements of the original file photo...I'ts no helicopter-not allowed down there.......showed the pic's to the Canada aviation department...and here's there response
